column1: So apparently more and more Americans are eating fishsticks. Have you seen this? Have you read about this? Loving fishsticks, kinda makes me wonder, you know? What is everybody, a gay fish?
You little fuckers! Your comedy awards show has put us all out of work!
Those fuckers! Let's just kill them, Sandler!  Let's just kill them all, right fuckin' now!
Let's hear it for Ms. Crabtree. What an up-and-comer!
